mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.course_id, a.question_id, a.question_name, a.question_type, a.question_difficulty, a.score, a.question_analysis, a.question_answer, a.items, a.create_date, a.modify_date FROM question a
mapper.insert: insert into question ( id, course_id, question_id, question_name, question_type, question_difficulty, score, question_analysis, question_answer, items, create_date, modify_date, is_deleted ) values ( #{id}, #{courseId}, #{questionId}, #{questionName}, #{questionType}, #{questionDifficulty}, #{score}, #{questionAnalysis}, #{questionAnswer}, #{items, jdbcType=OTHER, typeHandler=com.af.common.config.JsonObjectHandler}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, #{modifyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, javaType=java.util.Date}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=INTEGER} );
mapper.select: select ifnull((select 1 from question where question_id = #{questionId} and is_deleted = 0 limit 1), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE question set is_deleted = 1 WHERE question_id = #{question_id}
